MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. It has been necessary for our engineers to remove generators so that they can complete the permanent repair. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:06pm on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
